key_insights.description: The optimal number of topics differs between curricula: 5 topics in 2018 vs. 8 topics in 2024.
key_insights.interpretation: The 2024 curriculum covers a wider range of distinct themes.

key_insights.description: The average similarity between topics across curricula is 0.040 (0-1 scale).
key_insights.interpretation: This indicates substantial differences between the two curricula, with limited continuity in content.

key_insights.description: There are 5 topics unique to the 2018 curriculum and 8 topics unique to the 2024 curriculum.
key_insights.interpretation: This represents significant content turnover, with approximately 100.0% of topics being substantially different.
